projects.title: Learning from Reward-Free Offline Data: A Case for Planning with Latent Dynamics Models
projects.description: A study analyzing RL and control-based methods for learning from offline datasets without reward annotations. The research evaluates dataset properties affecting performance, showcasing the advantages of planning with latent dynamics models.

projects.title: Eidetic Learning: an Efficient and Provable Solution to Catastrophic Forgetting
projects.description: This paper introduces Eidetic Learning, a method that eliminates catastrophic forgetting in neural networks without requiring rehearsal. The approach ensures efficient and scalable learning across successive tasks.

projects.title: Curvature Tuning: Provable Training-free Model Steering From a Single Parameter
projects.description: Curvature Tuning (CT) is a training-free method for model steering that modulates decision boundary curvature using a single parameter. This efficient approach enhances generalization and robustness across downstream tasks.

projects.title: No Location Left Behind: Measuring and Improving the Fairness of Implicit Representations for Earth Data
projects.description: FAIR-Earth is a dataset designed to evaluate biases in Earth representation models. The study highlights disparities in modeling specific geographic features and proposes spherical wavelet encodings to improve fairness and accuracy.

projects.title: ENHANCED MEDICAL IMAGING
projects.description: Improving diagnostics with AI-based segmentation and classification techniques, this project focuses on enhancing the clarity and precision of medical images. The research leverages state-of-the-art deep learning algorithms to detect subtle anomalies in imaging data, potentially leading to earlier disease detection and better patient outcomes.

projects.title: OPTIMIZATION STRATEGIES
projects.description: Developing efficient gradient-based optimization methods for training deep networks, this project explores innovative strategies to reduce training time and improve model accuracy. By experimenting with novel loss functions and learning rate schedules, the research provides a deeper understanding of the optimization landscape in deep learning.

projects.title: IMAGE RESTORATION
projects.description: Restoring and enhancing low-resolution images using GANs, this project delves into the capabilities of generative adversarial networks to reconstruct details in degraded images. The study covers various techniques to balance sharpness and authenticity, resulting in images that are both high-quality and visually coherent.

projects.title: RECURRENT PATTERNS
projects.description: Investigating long-term dependencies in time-series data with LSTMs, this research analyzes how recurrent neural networks capture and predict sequential patterns. The findings contribute to improving forecasting models in various fields such as finance, weather prediction, and natural language processing.

projects.title: NATURAL LANGUAGE UNDERSTANDING
projects.description: Utilizing transformer-based architectures for advanced language understanding and context-aware text generation.

projects.title: DATA AUGMENTATION TECHNIQUES
projects.description: Exploring various data augmentation strategies to enhance model generalization across diverse datasets.

projects.title: I dontknow
projects.description: Exploring various data augmentation strategies to enhance model generalization across diverse datasets.
